![Screenshot of Wayback Machine for Chrome](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zrgZAjn9YPRybG3XDKDmnDTf-AQ9ZMiOMaU2yTVWdPd04EigRlMmjH87JNBMYlGrlV4NR7QhOE0=w640-h400-e365)	
#Reduce annoying 404 pages by automatically checking for an archived copy in the Wayback Machine.

###Wayback Machine detects error codes 404, 408, 410, 451, 500, 502, 503, 504, 509, 520, 521, 523, 524, 525, and 526 and checks to see if archived versions of the URLs requested are available.  If they are, a message will be displayed offering the opportunity to view the archived version.	
	
**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/waybackmachine-chrome/readme.md)**
summary: Wayback Machine is a Chrome extension to check Internet Archive for archived versions of web pages.
author: Internet Archive (Archive.org)
